headline: Is Mid-America Apartment Communities (MAA) Pricing Look Attractive After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Mid-America Apartment Communities stock at around US$135.79 is offering fair value right now, you are not alone. The share price has been relatively soft recently, with a 0.9% decline over the last 7 days, a 1.5% decline over the last 30 days and a 2.4% decline year to date. The 1 year return sits at a 4.5% decline and the 5 year return is 22.1%. These moves are drawing attention back to the fundamentals of apartment focused real estate and how investors are...
